ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and sons who stay with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And sons always present by his side,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and sons ever present with him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and children living in his presence,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And gave him sons present before him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And sons dwelling in his presence,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And sons abiding in his presence
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and sons to be by his side,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And sons present by his side.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [gave him] sons to be at his side,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And sons to be by his side!-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And children to be by his side!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and sons that stand in witness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [74:13] and sons, ten or more, present [by his side], present at social gatherings and whose testimonies are listened to,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And sons abiding in his presence) never out of his sight. He had ten sons.
